item.title: Parts of the ostrich not to be eaten by children
item.summary: A certain portion of the Ostrich not to be eaten by children. In the Katkop dialect by Díä!kwãin (L V.-20. 5573 rev. and 5574 rev.). ||xabbitten ||xabbitten ate the forbidden part of the ostrich and developed growths on his face afterwards.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book V-20
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
